attributes.action: require the immediate resignation of any Minister of Government who violates any rule, regulation, and/or statute, in which they have been instrumental in forming as a Ministerial member of said Government, and in particular the Prime Minister should seek the resignation of the Attorney General, Baroness Scotland, for violating the immigration regulations which she helped to draft and implement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The phrases ‘glasshouses’ and Ceasar’s Wife’ come to mind. Politicians must demonstrate they are above suspicion on all matters lawful. Those who fail that responsibility should be dismissed from their post. Most especially any Minister who has helped to draft a law or regulation and is then seen to violate that same law or regulation should be required to resign with immediate effect or be sacked instantly by the Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
